item.description:
Ever wanted to identify everything in sight - birds, plants, trees, flowers? Here's your chance. Herb can identify most every birdsong, tree, flower, shrub and plant. Learn the names, as well as interesting stories. Ask as many questions as you want. Meet at 77 Tanager St. #2 at 6:15. Encourage your friends to come.

You can also hire Herb to lead a walk for your school group, club, group of friends, etc. and he's happy to travel to where you are.

6:30-8:30, $15, sliding scale to $10. Sign up in advance to make sure there are enough people to go.

Herb is an expert on birdsong and has been studying the bird and plant kingdom for a number of years. Share his passion for the beauty and unique flavors of nature.

Herb Pearce, 781 648 3737, herb@herbpearce.com, www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Birdsong, Plant, Flower, Tree Walk
